Hide | Full Movie | Detective Crime Thriller Movie | Six Mummified Bodies Found | Best Movie On Movie Central | Amazing New Free Movies On YouTube

Based on the novel by Lisa Gardner the film follows a Boston detective tasked with uncovering the truth behind the discovery of six mummified bodies.Can the detective solve the case before the culprit strikes again?

2011.  Stars: Carla Gugino, Mark-Paul Gosselaar, Kevin Alejandro

metadata.Plot: After her mother commits suicide in the bathtub, Emily Callaway is taken to live upstate in new surroundings to forget her traumatic past. Psychologist David, her father, learns that his daughter has a new friend, the enigmatic, never to be seen, imaginary (or not?) Charlie. A deadly game of hide-and-seek ensues. Who is Charlie? And what is troubling David in his dreams?
metadata.Actors: Robert De Niro, Dakota Fanning, Famke Janssen
